attributes.action: support the move by Douglas Carswell MP to change the Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following revelation of the details about expense claims by MPs the moral authority of Parliament is at an all time low.  Only a new Speaker of the Commons can carry out a thorough clean-up and implement a system with public support.  The support of the Prime Minister would indicate where he really stands on this matter.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
